name: CNSaveRequest
desc: An object that collects the changes you want to save to the user's contacts database.

items.name: func add(CNMutableContact, toContainerWithIdentifier: String?)
items.desc: Adds the specified contact to the contact store.

items.name: func update(CNMutableContact)
items.desc: Updates an existing contact in the contact store.

items.name: func delete(CNMutableContact)
items.desc: Deletes a contact from the contact store.

items.name: func add(CNMutableGroup, toContainerWithIdentifier: String?)
items.desc: Adds a group to the contact store.

items.name: func update(CNMutableGroup)
items.desc: Updates an existing group in the contact store.

items.name: func delete(CNMutableGroup)
items.desc: Deletes a group from the contact store.

items.name: func addMember(CNContact, to: CNGroup)
items.desc: Adds a contact as a member of a group.

items.name: func removeMember(CNContact, from: CNGroup)
items.desc: Removes a contact as a member of a group.

items.name: func addSubgroup(CNGroup, to: CNGroup)
items.desc: Add the specified group to a parent group.

items.name: func removeSubgroup(CNGroup, from: CNGroup)
items.desc: Remove a subgroup from the specified parent group.
